recipesJson.name: Kiwi Strawberry Bubble Tea
recipesJson.author: RinVapes
recipesJson.description: If you like Addy's yogurt, you'll probably like this. The similarity wasn't intentional... I just like strawberry and kiwi together and FW is my favorite kiwi. Added to the Milk tea, it almost has a yogurt effect. Shave and vape for sure. Waiting will just make it creamier.
